sentences.sContent: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.sCn: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.sContent: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.sCn: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

synos.tran: 混乱；食堂，伙食团；困境；脏乱的东西
把事情弄糟；制造脏乱；玩弄

phrases.pCn: 同…一起用膳；胡乱摆弄；干扰；与…厮混在一起
制造混乱；搞成一团糟；[口]拉屎
浪费时间；一片狼籍；弄混
胡闹；瞎混；闲逛，浪费时间；粗鲁对待某人

words.tran: 凌乱的，散乱的；肮脏的，污秽的；麻烦的

trans.tranOther: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

trans.tranCn: 弄脏， 弄乱； 搞糟
trans.tranOther: to make something look untidy or dirty
